name: Theme dark for Magic Actions for YouTube ™
description:
Theme to put the Magic Actions for YouTube ™ interface to the colors of the theme DarkTube created by Nass O.

DarkTube: https://userstyles.org/styles/117673/darktube

▼ Magic Actions for YouTube ™ ▼

Chrome - https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/magic-actions-for-youtube/abjcfabbhafbcdfjoecdgepllmpfceif
Opera - https://addons.opera.com/fr/extensions/details/magic-actions-for-youtube/?display=en
Firefox (Direct Download) - https://naclhost-wwwss11.ssl.supercp.com/magicactions/update/magicactions.xpi

be sure to uncheck "Enable Day/Night feature" in the Magic Actions for YouTube ™  settings.

Tutorial : http://image.noelshack.com/fichiers/2016/09/1456866795-capture.png
